      • getAddress

        public java.net.InetAddress getAddress()
        Returns the destination InetAddress of this ModbusChannel.
        Returns:
        the destination address as InetAddress.

      • setAddress

        public void setAddress(java.net.InetAddress adr)
        Sets the destination InetAddress of this ModbusChannel.
        Parameters:
        adr - the destination address as InetAddress.

      • getPort

        public int getPort()
        Returns the destination port of this ModbusChannel.
        Returns:
        the port number as int.

      • setPort

        public void setPort(int port)
        Sets the destination port of this ModbusChannel. The default is defined as Modbus.DEFAULT_PORT.
        Parameters:
        port - the port number as int.

      • getUnitID

        public int getUnitID()
        Gets the unit identifier for this ModbusChannel.

        The identifier should be a 1-byte non negative integer value valid in the range of 0-255.

        Returns:
        unit id [0..255]

      • setUnitID

        public void setUnitID(int num)
        Sets the unit identifier for this ModbusChannel.

        The identifier should be a 1-byte non negative integer value valid in the range of 0-255.

        Parameters:
        num - the unit identifier number to be set, [0..255].

      • getConnectTimeout

        public int getConnectTimeout()
        Returns the connection timeout for this ModbusChannel.
        Returns:
        the timeout in milliseconds.

      • setConnectTimeout

        public void setConnectTimeout(int connectTimeout)
        Sets the connection timeout for this ModbusChannel.
        Parameters:
        connectTimeout - the timeout in milliseconds.

      • getTimeout

        public int getTimeout()
        Returns the execution timeout for this ModbusChannel.
        Returns:
        the timeout in milliseconds.

      • setTimeout

        public void setTimeout(int timeout)
        Sets the execution timeout for this ModbusChannel.
        Parameters:
        timeout - the timeout in milliseconds.

      • connect

        public void connect()
             throws java.io.IOException
        Opens this ModbusChannel with current timeout. Uses the current value for connectTimeout.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if there is a network failure.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - - if timeout expires before connecting
        java.nio.channels.ClosedByInterruptException - - If another thread interrupts the current thread while the connect operation is in progress, thereby closing the channel and setting the current thread's interrupt status

      • connect

        public void connect(int timeout)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Opens this ModbusChannel with given timeout. Uses the given timeout value. The currentTimeout value is updated to use this value.
        Parameters:
        timeout - connection timeout value in milliseconds.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - if there is a network failure.
        java.net.SocketTimeoutException - - if timeout expires before connecting
        java.nio.channels.ClosedByInterruptException - - If another thread interrupts the current thread while the connect operation is in progress, thereby closing the channel and setting the current thread's interrupt status

      • close

        public void close()
        Closes this ModbusChannel.

      • isConnected

        public boolean isConnected()
        Tests if this ModbusChannel is connected.
        Returns:
        true if connected, false otherwise.

      • execute

        public ModbusMessage execute(ModbusMessage requestMsg)
                      throws ModbusException
        Perform request/response transaction.

        Locks the ModbusChannel for sending an initial requestMsg and reading the related responseMsg.

        Parameters:
        requestMsg - Request Message
        Returns:
        responseMsg - Response Message
        Throws:
        ModbusException - if an I/O error occurs, or the response is a modbus protocol exception.
